name: Mini Quest
description:
A web-based rouge-like 2D short game with authentication and authorization.

Built with: NextJs, NodeJs, ExpressJS, MongoDB.

name: Inventory Microservice
description:
Inventory Microservice used to create and manage items in an inventory

Built with: Azure, NodeJS, Docker, Terraform, Firebase .

name: Fragment Manager
description:
Fragment Microservice used to create and manage fragments with authorization.

Built with: NodeJS, Docker, AWS, LocalStack.
